layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 40x24
  LayoutTable (positioned) {table} at (0,0) size 40x24
    LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (0,0) size 40x24
      LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 40x20
        LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 36x20 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
          LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 34x18
            text run at (1,1) width 34: "a test"
